column5: Great little 300 square foot guest house with private entrance in a quiet corner of a big back yard. Brand new bathroom. Beautiful natural light and smart, stylish furnishings.  Perfectly situated in East Kessler Park, just a mile from the adorable Bishop Arts District and quick access to Downtown and Uptown Dallas. A few blocks from the paved Kessler Park Trail, perfect for a jog or bike ride.  Perfect for couples, solo adventurers, or business travelers.
column8: Private Guesthouse Near Bishop Arts District
